item.title: WordPress Website Framework
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:

The post WordPress Website Framework appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
WordPress is now only working as a CMS Now, We can make a lot of exciting web development and features in WordPress. Theme builders make the development of a website so easy that anyone can develop a website without knowledge of prior code.
But I am writing to reach the people who love to do Programs with backend functionality especially PHP and Javascript.
Now some frameworks really make WordPress development simple in programming, lightweight, and also good for speed optimization.
Few of them are:
  • ACF
  • CMB2
  • Kirki Framework
  • Carbon Fields and
  • Redux framework
If you have the knowledge about this framework sooner or later you will succeed and if you don’t have the knowledge, Please grab the knowledge with that, it will really help you a lot.

The post WordPress Website Framework appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
